name: Paradox Chaos
description:
INTRODUCTION

A clicker game where you trapped in a endless time loop by a powerful being. 

Can you get to win 100 battles in a row while sometimes fighting different timelines of yourself? Or will you give up before that?

SUPPORT

The game support android and window.

So you could also dowload this game on mobile or PC!

This game is for the Clicker Jam Winter 2023 where the theme is Interdimensional.
